__e: I still believe that we can one day be free of the Wraith.
My people are strong and proud, but Atlantis is the best hope for us all.
Fire did not fall from the sky in Atlantis like it does here.
I always hoped we'd work together in Atlantis.
I figure it'll take us maybe two days to reach Atlantis by boat.
In my desire to come to Atlantis, I have revealed too much.
